name: Cool Pool
overview:
A "virtual reality" game of billiards with three selectable types of background music including jazz, rock and fusion. The game has an operator-selectable strip-tease feature.

The game has four different selectable types of pool: Straight Pool, Eight Ball, Nine Ball and Strip Pool. The Strip Pool game contains adult-related material and is not intended to be suitable for younger players. There are also three different selectable girl characters and acts featured in this game.
